name: echinoderm
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of sea creature with raised areas or sharp points on its skin and a body made of five equal parts arranged around the centre: Echinoderms like the starfish live on the sea floor.
Mark Newman/The Image Bank/GettyImages
